acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These photographs were purchased by the University of Virginia Library on October 22, 1996.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of four hand colored, silver-print photographs of historic Virginia sites, taken in 1926 by D.N. Davidsonof Davidson's Educational Art Pictures, and each signed by the photographer and accompanied by an informational card glued to the mat surrounding the photograph.
The four historic sites include: Gunston Hall, Fairfax County, Virginia; the Carlyle House, Alexandria, Virginia; St. John's Church, Richmond, Virginia; and the College of William and Mary.
